Use candles: Candles are a classic and elegant way to light up a room at night. They come in various shapes, sizes, and scents, and can create a warm and cozy atmosphere.
Use natural light: If the room has large windows, you can use natural light to your advantage. Open the curtains and blinds and let the moonlight or sunlight illuminate the room.
Use a portable lantern: A portable lantern is a great option if you need to light up a specific area in the room. You can carry it around and adjust the brightness as needed.
Use LED lights: LED lights are energy-efficient and long-lasting. You can use them to light up the room and create a modern and stylish atmosphere.
Use a fireplace: If your room has a fireplace, you can use it to light up the room. The flames can provide warmth and light, and the crackling sound can be soothing.
